value.name: Suspect In CHP Officer's Shooting Has Long Criminal History
value.description: Forty-nine-year-old Aaron Luther's criminal history includes attempted ... to appear in court Monday on charges of sexual assault police say he committed in 2003 and 2020. Katie Johnston reports.

value.name: Wild California freeway shootout leaves officer, gunman dead
value.description: KABC-TV reported that a man identified the shooter as his son, Aaron Luther, 49, of neighboring Beaumont. “We don’t know his motive for this crime,” Riverside Police Chief Sergio Diaz said.

value.name: High school baseball: Carthage defeats Watertown in Frontier League action
value.description: May 22—WATERTOWN — Aaron Luther and his Carthage baseball teammates were determined to not go quietly against rival Watertown on Friday. After losing the first two games of the series to the Cyclones, Luther and the Comets, buoyed by the solid pitching ...

value.name: Frontier League roundup: Bach ignites Carthage softball to triumph over Indian River, 14-13
value.description: Maddox Palmer registered a hit for Sandy Creek (2-10). Aaron Luther struck out 14 as the Comets bested the Warriors in an "A" Division game in Carthage. Tommy Storms recorded three hits and two RBIs for Carthage (5-4, 3-3). Reshawn Prince provided a pair ...

value.name: Two injured after car crashes while trying to pass on Day Road
value.description: May 22—Two people were injured Friday afternoon when a vehicle trying to pass several vehicles on Day Road in the Town of Lockport drove off the side of the road and rolled into a farmer's field.

value.name: Frontier League roundup: Clough sparks Watertown past General Brown in boys lacrosse win

value.name: Suspect In Riverside Murder Of CHP Officer Identified As Convicted Felon Aaron Luther
value.description: Authorities Tuesday identified Aaron Luther as the suspect who engaged law enforcement officers in a massive shootout just off the 215 Freeway.

value.name: Suspect In CHP Officer's Shooting Has Long Criminal History
value.description: Forty-nine-year-old Aaron Luther's criminal history includes attempted murder and assault with a deadly weapon against an officer. Tina Patel reports.
